turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I'm trying to book a table for two at a nice Italian restaurant in the city center this Saturday, but everything seems to be fully booked. It's so frustrating! Any chance you can help?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Let me check availability for you. I'm looking for Italian restaurants in the city center for two people this Saturday. Could you please provide a time preference, or a range of times you'd be available?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, ideally between 7:30 PM and 9:00 PM. Also, I know this is a long shot given how busy it is, but is there any way to filter by places with outdoor seating? My companion really prefers to eat outside.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I am checking for Italian restaurants in the city center for two people, between 7:30 PM and 9:00 PM this Saturday, that also have outdoor seating. I found one possibility: 'Bella Notte' has a table available at 8:15 PM with outdoor seating. Would you like me to book it for you? Or would you like other options?
